name: FreeCallinc.com
author: freecallinc.com

sections.description:
Let visitors call you for free from your site. ★★★★★

Be available anywhere, anytime by letting anyone on your site call you for free. Just add Free Call to any of your pages, so visitors can phone or message you in a click. It’s a great way to boost your service, sales and more, and keep customers happy.

Features

  • ✓ Receive visitor calls straight to your cell or phone
  • ✓ Choose your availability by setting Do Not Disturb hours
  • ✓ Let your site visitors get in touch with you by phone or message
  • ✓ Use call recording so you never miss a thing

Youtube demo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xAY6STLsTbs
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin and activate it.
  2. Click to connect to FreeCallinc.com and login.
  3. Copy and paste your Company ID and your Site ID and hit Save.
  4. Enable FreeCall Plugin.
  5. You can customize the Free Call plugin theme and color from freecallinc.com website.
sections.faq: For any support issues, please contact http://www.freecallinc.com.

short_description: Increase your website sales, and improve your customer support through worldwide simple calling service.
